overview: Fleeing the terrible Rigatoni, Rayman and his friends find refuge in the mysterious metropolis of Aéropolis. The charming Betina, Cookie the rascal, the strange LacMac and the little Flips accompany Rayman in this crazy adventure: will they escape the clutches of Inspector Grub that Rigatoni has launched at their heels?
title: Rayman: The Animated Series
